scripts.bump:patch: bump patch package.json package-lock.json README.md style.css
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor package.json package-lock.json README.md style.css
scripts.bump:major: bump major package.json package-lock.json README.md style.css
scripts.css: postcss css '!css/**/*.min.css' '!css/**/*.css.map' -u autoprefixer postcss-combine-media-query postcss-sort-media-queries -d css --ext .min.css
scripts.postcss: postcss css '!css/**/*.min.css' '!css/**/*.css.map' -u autoprefixer postcss-combine-media-query postcss-sort-media-queries cssnano -d css --ext .min.css --no-map
scripts.sprite: svg-sprite --dest img --css true --css-bust false --css-layout vertical --css-dest '' --css-sprite icon-sprite.svg img/svg-icons/*.svg
